org.jbei.ice.services.rest

Class AccessTokenResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jbei.ice.services.rest.RestResource
      • org.jbei.ice.services.rest.AccessTokenResource

  • @Path(value="/accesstoken")
public class AccessTokenResource
extends RestResource
    API for access tokens (also session id for the user interface)
    Author:
    Hector Plahar

    • Method Detail

      • create

        @POST
@Produces(value="application/json")
@Consumes(value="application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response create(AccountTransfer transfer)
        Creates a new access token for the user referenced in the parameter, after the credentials (username and password) are validated. If one already exists, it is invalidated
        Parameters:
        transfer - wraps username and password
        Returns:
        account information including a valid session id if credentials validate

      • deleteToken

        @DELETE
public void deleteToken(@HeaderParam(value="X-ICE-Authentication-SessionId")
                      String sessionId)
        Invalidates the specified session information.
        Parameters:
        sessionId - session identifier to invalidates

      • get

        @GET
@Produces(value="application/json")
public AccountTransfer get(@HeaderParam(value="X-ICE-Authentication-SessionId")
                               String sessionId)
        Retrieve account information for user referenced by session id
        Parameters:
        sessionId - unique session identifier for logged in user
        Returns:
        account information for session if session is valid, null otherwise
